p: In this research, the results were evaluated based on mean ± standard deviation (SD) using SPSS software version 22 (SPSS, Inc., Chicago, IL, USA) by one-way ANOVA and Tukey's statistical tests. Values of P < 0.05 were considered statistically significant. All tests for the antimicrobial and anticancer effects were repeated three times. Graphs were plotted in Excel (2010).
